description.en: Send an email using Resend's email API. Supports HTML, plain text, attachments, and custom headers.
description.de: Sende eine E-Mail über die Resend E-Mail-API. Unterstützt HTML, Plain-Text, Anhänge und benutzerdefinierte Header.

vars.API_KEY: env:RESEND_API_KEY|Get your API key from the Resend.com Dashboard at https://resend.com/api-keys

inputs.name: From
inputs.description: Sender email address. To include a friendly name, use the format 'Your Name <email@example.com>'.
inputs.bot: The sender email address. Can include a friendly name like 'Acme <onboarding@resend.dev>'.

inputs.name: To
inputs.description: Recipient email address(es). For multiple addresses, separate with commas.
inputs.bot: The recipient email address or addresses. Can be a single email or comma-separated list of emails.

inputs.name: Subject
inputs.bot: The subject line of the email.

inputs.name: HTML Content
inputs.description: The HTML version of the email message.
inputs.bot: The HTML content of the email. This is optional if plain text is provided.

inputs.name: Plain Text Content
inputs.description: The plain text version of the email message.
inputs.bot: The plain text content of the email. If not provided, HTML will be used to generate plain text.

inputs.name: Reply To
inputs.bot: The email address that replies should be sent to.

inputs.name: CC
inputs.description: CC recipient email address(es). Separate multiple addresses with commas.
inputs.bot: Carbon copy recipient email addresses. Can be a single email or comma-separated list.

inputs.name: BCC
inputs.description: BCC recipient email address(es). Separate multiple addresses with commas.
inputs.bot: Blind carbon copy recipient email addresses. Can be a single email or comma-separated list.
